```{r}

library(plyr)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(gmodels)
library(reshape)
library(tidyr)
library(knitr)
library(plotly)
if (!require("processx")) install.packages("processx")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE) 

csv_extraction_color<-read.csv(file = "../../csv/csv_report_color.csv", skip='0', sep = ";", header = FALSE)
colnames(csv_extraction_color) <- c("filename","project_id","element_type","color","E")

csv_extraction_color <- csv_extraction_color %>% group_by(project_id, color) %>% tally() %>% group_by(project_id) %>% tally()

library(plotly)
```
